item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 8, 2024 at 1:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Just: Just a Command Runner (327 points | 209 comments)
2. MIT largest open-source car design dataset, incl aerodynamics, to speed design (163 points | 60 comments)
3. Browsing negative content online makes mental health struggles worse (5 points | 2 comments)
4. Show HN: Countless.dev – A website to compare every AI model: LLMs, TTSs, STTs (230 points | 57 comments)
5. The famed Notre Dame Cathedral in Paris reopens to great fanfare (44 points | 2 comments)
6. GroMo (YC W21) Is Hiring ( | hide)
7. Deepfakes weaponised to target Pakistan's women leaders (12 points | 1 comment)
8. Hiroshi Nagai: Japan's Sun-Drenched Americana (203 points | 33 comments)
9. Beekeepers halt honey awards over fraud in global supply chain (163 points | 161 comments)
10. John Carmack imagines a future where GPUs don't need PCs (9 points | 7 comments)
11. Economics and Homemakers (23 points | 11 comments)
12. Historically, 4NF explanations are needlessly confusing (49 points | 9 comments)
13. I algorithmically donated $5000 to Open Source (289 points | 62 comments)
14. My second year without a job (462 points | 723 comments)
15. Arctic uses a fan to cool another fan (9 points | 1 comment)
16. Show HN: I built an HTML5 RTL-SDR application (5 points | 4 comments)
17. Melons and Melancholy: "Eating and Being" illuminates the dynamics of dietetics (9 points | discuss)
18. Biggest shell programs (191 points | 101 comments)
19. Accessing a DRM Framebuffer to display an image (78 points | 11 comments)
20. Tempest Anderson: Pioneer of Volcano Photography (2015) (18 points | 1 comment)
21. Lies I was told about collab editing, Part 1: Algorithms for offline editing (274 points | 96 comments)
22. From the Bretton Woods system to global stagnation [pdf] (8 points | 14 comments)
23. Ultralytics AI model hijacked to infect thousands with cryptominer (63 points | 27 comments)
24. Mistakes as a new manager (297 points | 119 comments)
25. Can life emerge around a white dwarf? (105 points | 75 comments)
26. SpiderBasic (61 points | 31 comments)
27. Claud Cockburn invented guerrilla journalism (31 points | 6 comments)
28. Mathics 7.0 – Open-source alternative to Mathematica (148 points | 29 comments)
29. Protecting undersea internet cables is a tech nightmare (101 points | 103 comments)
30. OpenAI Reinforcement Fine-Tuning Research Program (203 points | 49 comments)
